odase.concurrency

Class RunnableTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • odase.concurrency.AbstractTask
      • odase.concurrency.RunnableTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<AbstractTask>, WaitObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatchWorker

    public class RunnableTask
extends AbstractTask
    A runnable task is an AbastractTask that executes a Runnable object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RunnableTask(OdaseRunnable odase_runnable)
      Create a new RunnableTask that wraps the OdaseRunnable object.
      RunnableTask(Runnable runnable)
      Create a new RunnableTask that wraps the Runnable object.

    • Method Summary

      Runs the runnable object.
